text: Abul Khayer is a Bangladeshi Cinematographer. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography for the film Setubandhan (1987). ==Selected films== ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! title: Abul Khayer
